column1: ## we need to delete all synchronized picklists from SAP or any other automated integration before we run a new import
## so for each synced picklist add an entry like below
## incomment only if this customer uses the CLOSED step after the COMPLETED step for incidents

column2: UPDATE IBANX_INCIDENT_AA SET VALUE='executing' WHERE NAME = 'cssClass' AND VALUE = 'completed' AND OID IN (SELECT ID AS OID FROM IBANX_INCIDENT WHERE OBJECT_STATE = 'COMPLETED');

column1: ## non of the value items should be system anymore so application administrators can always modify the translations (only)

column2: UPDATE IBANX_VALUE_ITEM SET SYSTEM = 0 WHERE SYSTEM = 1;

column1: ## configure this setting to show a process activities instead of process states in the process charts
## configure this setting to show a process activity in the process charts to start the process
## New picklist values for KPI stats
## If customers use IE and force IE to run in a document mode that we do not support then you need to configure this
## setting so unite can force IE to run a mode that Unite supports.
## transform some legacy picklist item translations

column2: UPDATE IBANX_VL_ITEM_AA SET NAME='description_nl' WHERE NAME='nl'
UPDATE IBANX_VL_ITEM_AA SET NAME='description_en' WHERE NAME='en'
UPDATE IBANX_VL_ITEM_AA SET NAME='description_de' WHERE NAME='de'
UPDATE IBANX_VL_ITEM_AA SET NAME='description_fr' WHERE NAME='fr'
UPDATE IBANX_VL_ITEM_AA SET NAME='description_es' WHERE NAME='es'
UPDATE IBANX_VL_ITEM_AA SET NAME='description_sv' WHERE NAME='sv'
UPDATE IBANX_VL_ITEM_AA SET NAME='description_zh' WHERE NAME='zh'

column4: nl::lototo punt template beheerder;en::lotot point template administrator
